text.text: Anomalocaris, a large creature from formations across Canada, China, Greenland, Australia, and Utah. A large apex preditor, Anomalocaris ate the bottem dwelling trilobites of the Cambrian ocean. First discovered in 1886, it was described in 1892.
Anomalocaris was 1 meters from head to tail, around the size of an cat. Trilobies and other bottom feeders were the Anomalocaris's main food source, using its large claw-like arms.
